statements: SELECT * FROM reward_functions;
SELECT function_name, function_definition FROM reward_functions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, function_name, last_updated FROM reward_functions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reward_functions WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT function_name, function_definition FROM reward_functions WHERE function_name LIKE '%bonus%';
SELECT * FROM reward_functions WHERE id = 10;
SELECT function_name, function_definition FROM reward_functions WHERE function_name LIKE '%calculate%';
SELECT * FROM reward_functions ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, function_name, last_updated FROM reward_functions WHERE last_updated <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT function_name, function_definition FROM reward_functions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR function_name = 'calculate_bonus';
SELECT * FROM reward_functions;
SELECT function_name, function_value FROM reward_functions WHERE function_value > 0.5;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM agent_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT function_name FROM reward_functions WHERE function_value < 0.2 ORDER BY function_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM reward_functions JOIN agent_interactions ON reward_functions.id = agent_interactions.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM reward_functions WHERE function_value > 0.5 ORDER BY function_name DESC;
SELECT function_name, function_value FROM reward_functions WHERE function_value <= 0.8;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM agent_interactions WHERE agent_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM reward_functions WHERE function_name LIKE 'A%' AND function_value > 0.3;
SELECT function_name FROM reward_functions WHERE function_value BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.6 ORDER BY function_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Rewards;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM Rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Points';
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, reward_value FROM Rewards WHERE reward_value > 100;
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM Rewards ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, action_performed, interaction_timestamp FROM AgentInteractions WHERE agent_id = '123';
SELECT * FROM Rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Bonus';
SELECT reward_name, reward_value FROM Rewards ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM AgentInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_id, action_performed FROM AgentInteractions WHERE action_performed LIKE '%complete%' ORDER BY agent_id;
SELECT state_id, agent_id, state_description FROM AgentStates WHERE state_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY state_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY reward_value DESC;
SELECT id, agent_id, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE agent_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM agent_actions WHERE action_name LIKE '%login%';
SELECT id, agent_id, interaction_type, interaction_value FROM interactions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_id, total_reward, average_reward FROM agent_rewards WHERE total_reward > 100 ORDER BY total_reward DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_id, SUM(reward_value) AS total_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY total_reward DESC;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(reward_value) AS avg_reward FROM rewards GROUP BY agent_id HAVING avg_reward > 50 ORDER BY avg_reward ASC;
SELECT * FROM agent_actions WHERE action_value > 100 AND action_name LIKE '%bonus%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_type, AVG(interaction_value) AS avg_interaction FROM interactions GROUP BY agent_id, interaction_type ORDER BY agent_id, avg_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY timestamps DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE reward_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agent_name, agent_type FROM agents WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM agent_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-01 23:59:59';
SELECT agent_id, action_name, action_value FROM agent_actions ORDER BY action_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM rewards ORDER BY timestamps DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_type FROM agents WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_logs.log_message, agent_logs.log_time, agents.agent_name FROM agent_logs JOIN agents ON agent_logs.agent_id = agents.id WHERE agents.agent_type = 'AI';
SELECT rewards.function_name, agent_actions.action_name, agent_actions.action_value FROM rewards JOIN agent_actions ON rewards.id = agent_actions.agent_id;
SELECT interactions.id, agents.agent_name, rewards.reward_value FROM interactions JOIN agents ON interactions.agent_id = agents.id JOIN rewards ON interactions.reward_id = rewards.id;
